title: DHP Laurel Full Size Espresso Wood Arm Futon Frame with 6" Thermobonded High Density Polyester Fill Microfiber Mattress, Tan
features: Mission style wood arms with a sturdy metal frame with extra center legs for added support. Includes retainer clips to help prevent mattress from sliding.
Comes with a thermobonded high-density polyester fill mattress with a tufted microfiber upholstered cover that helps retain it's shape and provide long lasting comfort while sitting or sleeping.
Converts quickly and easily from a sofa to a full size sleeper. Mattress folds easily from a sleeping to a sitting position. Mattress firmness level: medium support.

Assembled in Canada from imported materials. Ships in one box. Quick assembly required. 1-year limited warranty. This mattress has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification. GREENGUARD Certified products are certified to GREENGUARD standards for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage.
Product dimensions: 80.5”L x 35”W x 37”H. Carton dimensions: 39.5”L x 29.5”W x 28.5”H. Weight limit: 600 lbs. Net weight: 72 lbs. Gross weight: 91.5 lbs.
description: Uncomplicated easy style gives your home a thoroughly relaxed look and feel and lets you enjoy some well earned creature comforts without breaking the bank. The opposite of fussy, the stylish Brax Black Metal Arm Full Size Futon Frame with 6 Inch Thermobonded High Density Polyester Fill Futon Mattress was made for casual moments and boasts an impressive space saving profile. The contemporary black metal futon frame can convert from a sofa to a full size sleeper bed in a heartbeat to accommodate guests and includes sound features such as practical retainer clips to prevent the included mattress from sliding and durable metal slats and center legs for improved stability. And let’s not ignore the attractive futon mattress! Able to easily fold to adapt to sitting or sleeping positions, the full size tufted mattress delivers cushiony medium support with its high density thermobonded polyester core. Accidental spills are no match for its equally soft poly cover which can easily be wiped clean. Greenguard Gold Certified, the mattress has met emission standards for indoor air quality and has been expertly crafted in Canada using imported materials. A range of mattress colors are available.
